pages.title: The Amethyst Crab
pages.text: Hang around a lush cave long enough and you'll be met with this cantankerous crustacean. Before getting the heart container, you'll need to slay all of:$(li)The Amethyst Crab$(li)The Wadjet$(li)The Kobolediator$(li)The Prowler$(li)The Ender Golem$(li)The Aptrgangr$(li)The Clawdian
